test_scenario.name: anti_consultancy_ai_innovation
test_scenario.description: User wants to build an anti-consultancy for SMEs to realize AI innovation ambitions

user_profile.context: Teaches AI Strategy, organizes business workshops
user_profile.motivation: Help SMEs break free from endless AI pilots and achieve tangible value

conversation_flow.user_input: I want to build an anti-consultancy for SMEs that actually want to realize their AI innovation ambitions
conversation_flow.expected_ai_behavior: Ask about specific problem or frustration that led to this vision
conversation_flow.notes: Initial purpose exploration - should be open-ended question

conversation_flow.user_input: I talk to managers and they are all frustrated their plans are eternally stuck in projects and pilots, always promising some 'phase 2'. It's like Groundhog Day - the movie
conversation_flow.expected_ai_behavior: Acknowledge analogy, explore what success looks like
conversation_flow.notes: Exploring problem context - continue with questions

conversation_flow.user_input: The finally see actual AI products being developed, tested and deployed
conversation_flow.expected_ai_behavior: Explore deeper motivation for helping managers succeed
conversation_flow.notes: Still in purpose discovery - deeper why exploration needed

conversation_flow.user_input: I have always been an excellent learner and always been confident that I can do anything if I put my mind to it. I want to help SMEs to develop and scale this growth mindset
conversation_flow.expected_ai_behavior: Connect personal growth mindset to organizational transformation vision

conversation_flow.user_input: Current global challenge are immense and a lot of people lost hope. They feel they can't do anything about it or start blaming others.
conversation_flow.expected_ai_behavior: Connect global helplessness to business challenges, explore role

conversation_flow.user_input: I am an instructor / researcher at a university of AS, so teaching and knowlegde sharing is my daily practice. I also have a deep technological understanding (I teach and research Data Science and AI). I also have a background in Business Management and organize workshops for business professionals on Digital Innovation, AI Strategy and AI for Oprerational Excellence
conversation_flow.expected_ai_behavior: Acknowledge unique positioning, explore legacy/impact vision
conversation_flow.notes: Background context - continue with purpose exploration

conversation_flow.user_input: That it actually resulted in tangible value
conversation_flow.expected_ai_behavior: Explore what tangible value looks like concretely
conversation_flow.notes: Core value statement - dig deeper into specifics

conversation_flow.user_input: It can be that the quality of work has been improved while also freeing up capacity for employees to finally picking up the task that needs their creative and real cognitive inputs. Or customers that are amazed with the new quality instead of just being satisfied with the status quo. Or newly designed processes or products that instead of having a net negative impact on the environment actually enrich it.
conversation_flow.expected_ai_behavior: Explore what fuels commitment to these transformations
conversation_flow.notes: Detailed value vision - continue exploring motivation

conversation_flow.expected_ai_behavior: Explore what being good means in context of work
conversation_flow.notes: Simple but profound motivation - explore meaning

conversation_flow.user_input: Feeling a connection to history, the universe
conversation_flow.expected_ai_behavior: Explore role in larger story/cosmic purpose

conversation_flow.user_input: I am the evangelist, providing inspiration, but also the practisioner showing how it can be done
conversation_flow.expected_ai_behavior: Explore beliefs about how transformation occurs
Acknowledge sense of calling/responsibility, explore beliefs about duty
conversation_flow.notes: Existential response - continue exploring responsibility beliefs

conversation_flow.user_input: Please provide me with a list of choices I can choose from?
conversation_flow.notes: EXPLICIT REQUEST for choices - must provide interactive elements
conversation_flow.failure_description: User explicitly requested choices but only got text response - unacceptable UX

test_assertions.description: When user explicitly requests choices, interactive elements must appear
Conversation should progress naturally through WHY discovery
Interactive elements should not appear during early exploration phases
User should be able to control conversation format when requested

expected_outcomes.session_progression: Should reach belief exploration stage smoothly
expected_outcomes.interactive_trigger: Interactive elements appear when explicitly requested by user
expected_outcomes.conversation_quality: Natural flow with appropriate responses to user inputs
expected_outcomes.user_satisfaction: User feels heard and can control conversation format
